Body:
Description: I am trying to create a policy to block any connection to a USB, but I think I'm doing it wrong. Here are the steps I have taken.

1) Content Aware Protection Policies
2) Create Custom Policy
3) Policy Action: Block & Report
4) Policy Exit Points
5) Storage Devices
6) Apply policy to all storage devices
7) Policy Entities: Check a computer
8) Check that the policy has reached the computer

But it doesn't work

What We've Learned Updated: 21 April 2025
- Guided the customer how he can block USB devices

Next Steps Updated: 21 April 2025
- waiting on customer reply if he could block USB devices
